Comments_List: So many skills and insights! I loved this course and Professor Warner was one of the best professors I have ever seen. I learned how to 'think' and for the first time, I was exposed to literary criticism and what a window this opened for me.
Currents with longer wavelengths in the environmental conversation
I didn't see any weaknesses in the course. There were many strengths. The seminar format was outstanding!  I learned much from my classmates, too.

I think most of the course was really, really great and informative, my one thought on improvement is that it might be useful to think more generally about the environmental humanities throughout the class, because what we did do was so interesting.
Breaks mid class to facilitate informal conversation between students. This will facilitate more inter disciplinary conversation during our short time together

Yes, I would recommend.  Professor Warner was kind, professional, well-liked and respected by all classmates, and he listened well to everyone.  He was open to any responses and was extremely supportive of all students.
